title: Graphics Cards
body: I'm upgrading my laptop to a desktop, and the desktop that I have in mind has a XFX 8800GTS XXX graphics card with dual 3.0 ghz cores and 4 gig ram- will this be enough to achieve 60fps on mid to high settings? Appreciate any responses

replies.body: It might be close but it's not that powerful of a rig
pretty much so long as I can run the game smoothly I don't mind- just tired of fps drops every time more than 5 champs are on screen
I wouldn't foresee that issue. If it happens drop your display settings
